Counts people, returns an overview of subjects

countPeople.Rd

Counts people, returns an overview of subjects

Usage

countPeople(
  cdm = NULL,
  cmaTable = NULL,
  generatedTable = NULL,
  cohortSchema = NULL,
  cohortId = NULL,
  n = 1
)

Arguments

cdm

A cdm reference via CDMConnector.

cmaTable

reference or in memory dataframe that contains CMA values

generatedTable

reference or in memory dataframe that contains generateChronicDrug exposure output

cohortSchema

string value of a schema in database

cohortId

vector with cohort ids to count people included

n

minimum number of rows per year for a person to be included in 'Yearly drug exposure record count' table

Value

list

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
cdm <- mockAdherenceFromOMOP()
chronicDrugExposure <- generateChronicDrugExposure(cdm = cdm, name = "chronic_drug_exposure_table", overwrite = T)
CMA_values <- adherenceCalculationsLoader(reference = chronicDrugExposure, cdm = cdm, cma = "CMA5")
counts <- countPeople(cdm = cdm, cmaTable = CMA_values, generatedTable = chronicDrugExposure)
} # }
